paragraphs.content: Chapter 16
paragraphs.contentHtml: Chapter 16

paragraphs.content: Now concerning the collection for the saints, as I have given order to the churches of Galatia, even so do ye.
paragraphs.contentHtml: Now concerning the collection for the saints, as I have given order to the churches of Galatia, even so do ye.

paragraphs.content: Upon the first day of the week let every one of you lay by him in store, as God hath prospered him, that there be no gatherings when I come.
paragraphs.contentHtml: Upon the first day of the week let every one of you lay by him in store, as God hath prospered him, that there be no gatherings when I come.

paragraphs.content: And when I come, whomsoever ye shall approve by your letters, them will I send to bring your liberality unto Jerusalem.
paragraphs.contentHtml: And when I come, whomsoever ye shall approve by your letters, them will I send to bring your liberality unto Jerusalem.

paragraphs.content: And if it be meet that I go also, they shall go with me.
paragraphs.contentHtml: And if it be meet that I go also, they shall go with me.

paragraphs.content: Now I will come unto you, when I shall pass through Macedonia: for I do pass through Macedonia.
paragraphs.contentHtml: Now I will come unto you, when I shall pass through Macedonia: for I do pass through Macedonia.

paragraphs.content: And it may be that I will abide, yea, and winter with you, that ye may bring me on my journey whithersoever I go.
paragraphs.contentHtml: And it may be that I will abide, yea, and winter with you, that ye may bring me on my journey whithersoever I go.

paragraphs.content: For I will not see you now by the way; but I trust to tarry a while with you, if the Lord permit.
paragraphs.contentHtml: For I will not see you now by the way; but I trust to tarry a while with you, if the Lord permit.

paragraphs.content: But I will tarry at Ephesus until Pentecost.
paragraphs.contentHtml: But I will tarry at Ephesus until Pentecost.

paragraphs.content: For a great door and effectual is opened unto me, and there are many adversaries.
paragraphs.contentHtml: For a great door and effectual is opened unto me, and there are many adversaries.

paragraphs.content: Now if Timotheus come, see that he may be with you without fear: for he worketh the work of the Lord, as I also do.
paragraphs.contentHtml: Now if Timotheus come, see that he may be with you without fear: for he worketh the work of the Lord, as I also do.

paragraphs.content: Let no man therefore despise him: but conduct him forth in peace, that he may come unto me: for I look for him with the brethren.
paragraphs.contentHtml: Let no man therefore despise him: but conduct him forth in peace, that he may come unto me: for I look for him with the brethren.

paragraphs.content: As touching our brother Apollos, I greatly desired him to come unto you with the brethren: but his will was not at all to come at this time; but he will come when he shall have convenient time.
paragraphs.contentHtml: As touching our brother Apollos, I greatly desired him to come unto you with the brethren: but his will was not at all to come at this time; but he will come when he shall have convenient time.

paragraphs.content: Watch ye, stand fast in the faith, quit you like men, be strong.
paragraphs.contentHtml: Watch ye, stand fast in the faith, quit you like men, be strong.

paragraphs.content: Let all your things be done with charity.
paragraphs.contentHtml: Let all your things be done with charity.

paragraphs.content: I beseech you, brethren, (ye know the house of Stephanas, that it is the firstfruits of Achaia, and that they have addicted themselves to the ministry of the saints,)
paragraphs.contentHtml: I beseech you, brethren, (ye know the house of Stephanas, that it is the firstfruits of Achaia, and that they have addicted themselves to the ministry of the saints,)

paragraphs.content: That ye submit yourselves unto such, and to every one that helpeth with us, and laboureth.
paragraphs.contentHtml: That ye submit yourselves unto such, and to every one that helpeth with us, and laboureth.

paragraphs.content: I am glad of the coming of Stephanas and Fortunatus and Achaicus: for that which was lacking on your part they have supplied.
paragraphs.contentHtml: I am glad of the coming of Stephanas and Fortunatus and Achaicus: for that which was lacking on your part they have supplied.

paragraphs.content: For they have refreshed my spirit and yours: therefore acknowledge ye them that are such.
paragraphs.contentHtml: For they have refreshed my spirit and yours: therefore acknowledge ye them that are such.

paragraphs.content: The churches of Asia salute you. Aquila and Priscilla salute you much in the Lord, with the church that is in their house.
paragraphs.contentHtml: The churches of Asia salute you. Aquila and Priscilla salute you much in the Lord, with the church that is in their house.

paragraphs.content: All the brethren greet you. Greet ye one another with an holy kiss.
paragraphs.contentHtml: All the brethren greet you. Greet ye one another with an holy kiss.

paragraphs.content: The salutation of me Paul with mine own hand.
paragraphs.contentHtml: The salutation of me Paul with mine own hand.

paragraphs.content: If any man love not the Lord Jesus Christ, let him be Anathema Maran-atha.
paragraphs.contentHtml: If any man love not the Lord Jesus Christ, let him be Anathema Maran-atha.

paragraphs.content: The grace of our Lord Jesus Christ be with you.
paragraphs.contentHtml: The grace of our Lord Jesus Christ be with you.

paragraphs.content: My love be with you all in Christ Jesus. Amen.
paragraphs.contentHtml: My love be with you all in Christ Jesus. Amen.

paragraphs.content: ¶ The first epistle to the Corinthians was written from Philippi by Stephanas, and Fortunatus, and Achaicus, and Timotheus.
paragraphs.contentHtml: ¶ The first epistle to the Corinthians was written from Philippi by Stephanas, and Fortunatus, and Achaicus, and Timotheus.
